Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Geosnap Data contains several datasets (as Quilt packages) created by the Center for Geospatial Sciences (CGS) at the University of California, Riverside. The data in this bucket includes the following:

Tabular and geographic data from the U.S. Census
Land cover imagery collected by the Multiresolution Land Features Consortium
Road network data processed from OpenStreetMap
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Geosnap Data contains several datasets (as Quilt packages) created by the Center for Geospatial Sciences (CGS) at the University of California, Riverside. The data in this bucket includes the following:

Tabular and geographic data from the U.S. Census
Land cover imagery collected by the Multiresolution Land Features Consortium
Road network data processed from OpenStreetMap
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use Python and other tools to collect and organize data, and we build upon that foundation. We utilize the Pandas library in Python to ensure that the data has no duplicates and to handle missing values or outliers. Then, we segment the data and convert it into a format supported by Filecoin.
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin:
Data files are stored in a public bucket in Apache Parquet and GeoTiff formats
